Comments_List: I became more acquainted to the Cervantess masterpiece through the  thorough analysis provided by the professors lectures. Also, the four essays That were required from ya to write further deepened my interest in the novel.
The course allowed me to read the novel from a new perspective. It helped me improve my reading and interpretation skills and to understand plenty of the subjects the book exposes.
The main strength was the fact we could read the novel in its original language, Spanish. I think that was very helpful for English-speakers students.

I would certainly do. Prof. Gonzlez Echevarra is a world renowned Quijote scholar, and being able to get acquainted with his wonderful insights and ways of making scholarship is an invaluable experience.
Yes, I would definitely recommend this course.
